identity.mission: Create a premium, festive, and dignified shelter discovery experience that breaks the 'generic nonprofit' mold.
principles: Fusion: Winter Festival aesthetics x Critical Utility Dashboard
Content: Real-time data is the hero
Contrast: Icy backgrounds vs. Warm, glowing accents

textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'

images.description: Winter fog with warm streetlights - atmospheric and emotional.
images.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay.

map.instruction: Ensure map pins are keyboard accessible. Provide a synchronized list view for all map data.

contrast.instruction: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds meets WCAG AA. Use 'text-slate-200' on dark, not 'text-gray-500'.

motion.instruction: Respect 'prefers-reduced-motion'. The snowfall effect MUST have a toggle or auto-disable.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. SETUP THEME: Configure tailwind.config.js with the 'Midnight Winter' palette.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Create the 'Control Room' layout for the main app view (Map Left/Top, List Right/Bottom).
4. IMPLEMENT MAP: Use OpenStreetMap data via Overpass API. Do NOT mock data if possible, or use a very realistic fallback.
5. ADD SNOW: Create a 'Snowfall' component that is subtle (small particles, slow movement).
6. NO TESTIMONIALS: Strictly adhere to the 'No Testimonials' rule.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic AI designs. Be bold with spacing (p-8, p-12).
Use 'glassmorphism' for overlays to keep the winter feel.
Ensure the 'Donate' button is always visible and distinct (Warm Gold).
Mobile responsiveness is paramount - the map must work on phones.
